vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φῡσιόω,
(φῦσα) puff up, [NT]:—passive, πρὸς τὰ θέματα πεφυσιωμένος [NT+1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to puff up, inflate; (passive) to be proud, arrogant
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to puff up, inflate; (passive) to be proud, arrogant
to inflate, puff up;, metaphorically to inflate with pride and vanity, 1Cor. 8:1; passive to be inflated with pride, to be proud, vain, arrogant, 1Cor. 4:6, 18, 19; 5:2; 13:4; Col. 2:18*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: causar vanidad o arrogancia ; (voz pasiva) ser vanidoso o arrogante
